title: Account names missing in Cloud Cost reports for AWS integrations
content:
Cloud account names are missing from Cloud Cost reports after you configure the billing data retrieval and cloud account import integrations for AWS. Only the Account IDs are displayed.

Cause

This issue occurs because the cloud account data synchronization, which runs on a schedule, has not yet occurred.

Solution

To resolve this issue, manually synchronize the cloud account, and then synchronize the spend groups:

  1. Log in to Agent Interface as the cloud integration administrator.
  2. In the main menu, go to Administration > Utilities > Integrations.
  3. Select the affected cloud account in the left-hand menu, and then select the the cloud account sync scenario.
  4. Click Run scenario, and then click OK to confirm the operation.
  5. In the main menu, go to Run > Cost Governance > Cloud Cost Limits, and then select the affected cloud cost limit to open the Cloud Cost Limit Details view.

  6. Click the Add icon to open the Add Spend Groups to Cloud Cost Limit dialog.

  7. Click Sync Spend Groups to manually sync the spend groups (cloud accounts), and then click Close.
